en.title: Siberian Cat Lifespan and Longevity Tips: Average Lifespan and Health Management
en.content:
The average lifespan of a Siberian is 12-18 years, which tends to be longer than the overall cat average of around 15 years. As a natural breed with fewer genetic health issues, some Siberians live to nearly 20 years with proper care.

Tips for a Long Life

Proper Diet Management

A well-balanced diet appropriate for the cat's age is essential. Switch food according to growth stage, adult stage, and senior stage, and maintain a healthy weight. Obesity increases the risk of various diseases.

Regular Health Check-ups

Annual or biannual check-ups enable early detection and treatment. Once your cat enters the senior stage at age 7 or older, we recommend check-ups every six months.

Adequate Exercise

Siberians are an active breed, so provide ample exercise opportunities with cat towers and toys. Ideally, ensure 15-20 minutes of daily playtime.

Low-Stress Environment

Stress can weaken a cat's immune system. Ensure they have a safe hiding spot, a clean litter box, and a quiet resting area.

Indoor-Only Living

Keeping cats exclusively indoors is recommended to avoid risks of traffic accidents and infectious diseases. Indoor cats are said to live several years longer on average than cats that go outdoors.

zh.title: 西伯利亚猫的寿命与长寿秘诀：平均寿命与健康管理
zh.content:
西伯利亚猫的平均寿命为12-18年，与猫咪总体平均寿命（约15年）相比偏长寿。作为天然猫种，遗传性健康问题较少，在适当护理下有些西伯利亚猫可以活到接近20岁。

长寿的秘诀

合理的饮食管理

根据年龄提供营养均衡的饮食是基本要求。根据成长期、成年期、老年期更换猫粮，并保持适当体重。肥胖会增加各种疾病的风险。

定期健康检查

每年1-2次的定期体检可以实现早发现、早治疗。进入7岁以上的老年期后，建议每半年检查一次。

适度运动

西伯利亚猫是活泼好动的猫种，请通过猫爬架和玩具提供充足的运动机会。理想情况下，每天确保15-20分钟的玩耍时间。

低压力的环境

压力会导致猫咪免疫力下降。请确保提供安心的藏身处、干净的猫砂盆和安静的休息空间。

完全室内饲养

为避免交通事故和传染病风险，推荐完全室内饲养。室内猫的平均寿命据说比外出猫长数年。
